title: Not From Brazil Volume II
description: The transatlantic long distance relationship embarks on a K-1 visa voyage through the perilous seas of forms, trials and interviews. This brave Portuguese pirate must face her darkest fears and fight true monsters to conquer more than her beloved's heart. Extra new characters and episodes never published before. This book is NOT a work of fiction. Any similarities to actual persons, living or dead, are purely NOT coincidental.
author: Vanessa Bettencourt
